channel.title: Extractor on Celonis hacks
channel.description: Recent content in Extractor on Celonis hacks

item.title: Run Extractor on Your Local Machine
item.description: From this week I would like to explain my experience regarding Event Collection functions (Extraction, Transformation, Load etc.). To do this, I try to create sample source systems and build code in Celonis training environment. As first topic, I would like to explain on premise Extractor, that is in the middle between your source systems (SAP, Oracle etc.) and Celonis EMS and support transferring data. By the way, because I do not want to pay licence of source systems for this blog, I would like to use open source Postgres database.
